title: Site-wide scrolling notice/ticker in shared sticky header

requirements.summary: Add a prominent, mobile-friendly marquee-style scrolling ticker in the shared sticky header with an English daily-update message, visible on home and post detail routes without causing layout shift.
acceptanceCriteria: A scrolling ticker/notice bar appears within the shared header area so it is visible on all routes (e.g., '/' and '/post/:postId').
The ticker text is in English and conveys: no need to update; visit daily for updates.
The ticker continuously animates (marquee-like) and is readable on mobile (no clipped text; adequate contrast).
The ticker does not break the existing sticky header behavior and does not cause layout shift that hides page content behind the header.

file_operations.description: Create a reusable SiteNoticeTicker component that renders a marquee-like, continuously scrolling notice message (English) with overflow-safe structure (e.g., duplicated inline content for seamless looping) and mobile-friendly typography/spacing to prevent clipping.
Add Tailwind keyframes/animation utilities to support continuous marquee scrolling (left-to-right or right-to-left) and ensure the animation is smooth and continuous across breakpoints.

Wire the SiteNoticeTicker into the shared header layout (within the existing sticky header) so it appears on all routes, and ensure header structure/spacing avoids layout shift or hidden content behind the sticky header.
